meanings.sent1: I begifted my friend a book for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: She always begifts thoughtful presents to her loved ones.
meanings.sent3: The cat begifted the mouse with a shiny toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun begifts the earth with warmth and light every day.
meanings.sent5: The kind fairy begifted the princess with a magical necklace.

meanings.sent1: He begifted his sister a beautiful bracelet.
meanings.sent2: They begift each other on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The magician begifted the audience with a surprise trick.
meanings.sent4: The teacher begifted the students with extra recess time.
meanings.sent5: The generous donor begifted the museum with a valuable painting.
